marklogic.body: Interesting article. It is unfortunate that over the last 10 years, the travel industry has had to handle terrorism, SARS, tsunamis, bird Flu, swine Flu, and the first ever entire global economic downturn. Through it the industry has proven to be robust, resilient as well as dynamic, obtaining new strategies to deal with difficulty. There are continually fresh troubles and possibilities to which the marketplace must once more adapt and Act in response.
